subject: Basketball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. star Charles Barkley was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol early Wednesday in Scottsdale, Ariz. An officer with a task force that focuses on drunken driving saw Barkley run a stop sign at about 1:30 a.m., Lt. Eric Shuhandler of the Gilbert Police Department said. Barkley was in the trendy Old Town area of Scottsdale.
